name: AlienCab
description:
Project context:

This Game was made in 3 days during the Game Dev Party Game jam Organised In Lyon back in 2013. 

Synopsis:

An alien have been spotted In New York city. It tricks pedestrians that want to take a cab and eat them. 

Gameplay:

In this infinite runner catch pedestrians with your tentacles in order to stay alive. Be careful you're chased by the police. Aloso Dodge the buildings.
